description:
This course has been designed for the average user who often needs some graphic design done, but just does not have the time to spend on mastering graphic design software.

The highlights of this course are:

  • Learning how to produce professional looking graphics
  • Being able to create those graphics with a very average skillset
  • Using free software and resources

The student will learn where and how to source and keep their resources together.

Where to find resources, and how to keep them together in an orderly way using a free online resource.

Students are then given a list of resources where they can find free graphics for their projects.

Using a free graphics editor, students are then taught how to create simple transparent backgrounds.

Finally, students are shown how to use a free online resource tool to create stunning graphics in a very easy way.
title: Amazing Graphic Design for Beginners
